Class StopLDAPMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo

        • com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.mojo.AbstractStopMojo
          • com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.ldap.mojo.StopLDAPMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.Logger, org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo

    @Mojo(name="stop",
      defaultPhase=POST_INTEGRATION_TEST)
public final class StopLDAPMojo
extends com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.mojo.AbstractStopMojo
    Implement stop goal for the plugin which shuts down the running LDAP directory server.
    Since:
    1.1.0
    Author:
    Brian Matthews
